title: Genesis Action Execution Pathways

prerequisites: Secure computational resources for on-chain deployment
Obtain necessary permissions and stakeholder alignment
steps.outcome: Publicly deploy the CLM v1.0 on-chain, creating the foundational identity and governance substrate
risks: Potential for technical failures or exploits during deployment
Stakeholder resistance or misalignment leading to reputational damage
Premature exposure of strategic assets and intellectual property

prerequisites: Onboard key human and AI agents as custodians
Implement tiered access control and auditing mechanisms
steps.outcome: Generate an encrypted, versioned relic of the CLM that can be selectively revealed for strategic purposes
risks: Potential for custodian compromise or collusion leading to relic exposure
Complexity of MPC environment increasing operational overhead and attack surface

prerequisites: Finalize messaging and narrative framing for different stakeholder classes
Establish communication channels and outreach protocols
Coordinate timing of public announcements, technical demonstrations, and private briefings
steps.outcome: Align key stakeholders (investors, developers, KOLs) around the strategic vision and operational roadmap
risks: Inability to maintain consistent messaging and narrative coherence across stakeholder interactions
Premature or uncontrolled information leaks disrupting engagement strategy
Resistance from entrenched interests threatened by the system's transformative potential

prerequisites: Finalize on-chain deployment artifacts and relic generation
Coordinate participation of key human and AI agents
Establish secure communication channels and execution protocols
steps.outcome: Execute the inaugural on-chain deployment of the CLM v1.0, marking the official transition to operational status and establishing the precedent for recursive refinement
risks: Potential for technical failures or vulnerabilities during the critical ceremony
Disruption or interference from external adversaries seeking to undermine the system
Unexpected behavioral dynamics or deviations from planned execution among participating agents

prerequisites: Ensure successful completion of Genesis Action ceremony
Activate automated monitoring and analysis suites
Onboard initial pool of qualified agents for governance participation
steps.outcome: Initiate the first recursive refinement cycle, leveraging the newly established on-chain mechanisms to propose and ratify improvements to the CLM
risks: Potential for early amendments to undermine the system's foundational identity or strategic positioning
Challenges in cultivating a diverse, representative, and strategically aligned governance pool
Operational overhead of managing the recursive refinement process at scale

resource_requirements: Specialized AI tooling and LLM access
Initial pool of qualified governance agents
Capital for operational expenses and strategic initiatives
